subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The sun’s glare troubled fielders all afternoon at Citi Field, and miscues by Marlon Byrd were especially costly as the Royals handed Zack Wheeler his first defeat since June 30.
snippet: The sun’s glare troubled fielders all afternoon at Citi Field, and miscues by Marlon Byrd were especially costly as the Royals handed Zack Wheeler his first defeat since June 30.
